txt.en:
'Greetings, [placeholder]. There are many Minstrels who wish to be Watchers of Resolve, but not all can accomplish their task alone. You should seek to aid your fellow Minstrels along their path.

'The greatest danger your fellow will face is the Deepclaw, Cracktooth, in Sk没mfil.

'Go now and prove your honour.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. You are truly a worthy Minstrel-friend.'
'Lend a hand to your fellow Minstrels, [placeholder].'
The Watcher of Resolve:  Lending a Hand
Many Minstrels wish to become Watchers of Resolve, but not all can accomplish their goals alone.
The Sk没mfil is east from the Foundations of Stone.\n\nBassela has instructed you to help a fellow Minstrel complete his or her final task in Sk没mfil.
Bassela is just outside Sk没mfil, east of the Shadowed Refuge in the Foundations of Stone.\n\nWith Cracktooth slain, you should return to Bassela with news of your success.
